entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 08:11 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 08:11 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
